array.string: Places to visit: San Francisco, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, Fremont, San Jose
Movies to watch: Speed, Transported, Life of PI, Avatar, How to train your dragon, Home alone 1, Home alone 2, Jurrasic Park, Snow man, Liar Liar
Restaurants to try: Spices, Curry, Noodles, Pizza, Sandwitch, Tacos
